I am a third year under graduate Student at JNTUH,Hyderabad.I am a Computer Enthusiast with good hand shake in programming,Specializing in developing high Quality Android apps.I love coding and aspire to build things to make world easier
My main motto is to solve problems,World is full of problems and are waiting to be solved.I wanted to be the part of solution the world needs
If you are reading this,Know you are awesome,because very few people open "ABOUT US" page in an app.To support us and for updates follow us on instagram
The main idea of this app is to help students complete their Boring assignments faster and efficiently without any delay

2.change the font,color,size and background of the assignment according to your needs and tap the create assignment button..you also have a preview at he bottom riht corner of the page which changes dynamically when ever you change your settings
3.you can manually type the text or you can scan and extract the text from the image.you can either capture the image using camera or you can select image from gallery
4.After capturing the image or selecting the image from gallery,crop the image and press the crop button and the extracted text is shown on the page
5.you can continue adding text to the panel by pressing the scan button again and every time you scan a image a page seperator is added which seperates page with other

6.make sure all the text is correct and all the page seperators are at correct position,you can also add or remove page seperators in your text.After making sure every thing is correct,tap on the convert button
7.check all the pages in the pdf are correct,you can always go back and correct your text any time you want
8.now tap on get pdf button and give a name for your pdf,and press copy and continue so that your text data is copied to clipboard and is not lost
9.your pdf is stored in PhoneStorage>Android>data>com.AppsbyHarsha.AssignmentPartner>files for more information click the button below
